mapper.select: SELECT tank_source.*,company.*,co.COUNTY_NAME,co.city_code,co.city_name,SUBSTR(tank_source.scccode,1,2) AS scc1, SUBSTR(tank_source.scccode,3,2) AS scc2,SUBSTR(tank_source.scccode,5,3) AS scc3,SUBSTR(tank_source.scccode,8,3) AS scc4 FROM tank_source LEFT JOIN company ON tank_source.company_id=company.com_id INNER JOIN ( SELECT county.COUNTY_ID,county.COUNTY_NAME,city.city_name,city.city_code FROM county LEFT JOIN city ON county.city_code=city.city_code ) co ON co.COUNTY_ID=company.county_id where tank_source.id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.insert:
insert into tank_source
id,
year,
scccode,
source_discrip,
company_id,
t_id,
tank_name,
tank_type,
material_type,
material_name,
emission,
flag,

#{year,jdbcType=CHAR},

#{sourceDiscrip,jdbcType=VARCHAR},

insert into tank_source (id, year, scccode, source_discrip, company_id, t_id, tank_name, tank_type, material_type, material_name, emission, flag ) values (#{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{year,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{scccode,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{sourceDiscrip,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{companyId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{tId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{tankName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{tankType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{materialType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{materialName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{emission,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, #{flag,jdbcType=INTEGER} ) ON DUPLICATE KEY UPDATE id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}, year = #{year,jdbcType=CHAR}, scccode = #{scccode,jdbcType=CHAR}, source_discrip = #{sourceDiscrip,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, company_id = #{companyId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, t_id = #{tId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, tank_name = #{tankName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, tank_type = #{tankType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, material_type = #{materialType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, material_name = #{materialName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, emission = #{emission,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, flag = #{flag,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.update:
update tank_source
year = #{year,jdbcType=CHAR},
scccode = #{scccode,jdbcType=CHAR},
source_discrip = #{sourceDiscrip,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
company_id = #{companyId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
t_id = #{tId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
tank_name = #{tankName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
tank_type = #{tankType,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
material_type = #{materialType,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
material_name = #{materialName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
emission = #{emission,jdbcType=DOUBLE},
flag = #{flag,jdbcType=INTEGER},
where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
